name: Sensory Rods
desc: For each Skill Point consumed by an ally target, their DMG taken reduces by 6% for 2 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 2 time(s).
enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point consumed by an ally target, their DMG taken reduces by 6% for 2 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).
